hero.title: Checklist before activating AI on your channels
hero.subtitle: WhatsApp and Instagram automation rely on verified business assets and up-to-date customer touchpoints. Use this guide to confirm you are ready—or let us handle the setup for you.

website.title: Publish an accurate website
website.description: Meta requires a live website that matches the business information shared with customers and policy reviewers.

points.1: Ensure services, pricing, and contact details are current.
points.2: Include legal pages (privacy policy, terms) that reference your company name.
points.3: If you do not have a site, our team can launch one for you in days.

website.cta: Need a website? We'll build and launch it for you.

meta.title: Verify your Meta business
meta.description: A Meta Business Portfolio with completed verification is required for WhatsApp Business API access.

points.1: Submit official documents that match your business legal name.
points.2: Add your website domain and verify it inside Business Manager.
points.3: If verification is pending or denied, we can manage the escalation with Meta on your behalf.

meta.cta: We assist with Meta Business verification end-to-end.

whatsapp.title: Prepare a dedicated WhatsApp number
whatsapp.description: The WhatsApp Business API cannot reuse a number that is already active on WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business.

points.1: Purchase or port a fresh phone number exclusively for the AI assistant.
points.2: Keep the number powered on and capable of receiving SMS or voice calls for verification.
points.3: We can source and configure a virtual number if you do not have one available.

instagram.title: Switch Instagram to a professional account
instagram.description: Instagram DM automation requires a Professional (Business or Creator) profile linked to your Meta Business Portfolio.

points.1: Convert the profile to Professional inside Instagram settings.
points.2: Link the profile to the verified Meta Business account.
points.3: Confirm messaging is enabled for connected tools.

support.title: No problem if you are missing steps
support.description: Our onboarding team can close the gaps quickly—website builds, Meta verification, number provisioning, and compliance checks.
support.cta: Talk to us and we will prepare everything for you.
